name: Arjaverse NFT
description:
A mysterious creature of immense size appears in the galaxy, floating out of nowhere and slowly approaching Earth.
Suddenly! A mouth opened, and the Earth was unexpectedly swallowed up in an instant, emitting an unknown light - BANG! The Seal explodes!
From then on, a planet full of sea otters was born - the Arjaverse!
The planet is 75% water, ice, and gems, and its exterior retains the appearance of Earth and the unknown creature, becoming a fantastical illusion.
This gave rise to the incredibly cute and unique adventurers - the seal citizens from Arjaverse.
